title: NBA Hall of Famer Reggie Miller is Breaking the Cycling Mold
content:
“Me being 6 feet 7 inches, I’m not your normal height-weight type cyclist. But that motivates me to get better, to be better, to go against these guys.”- Reggie Miller

Read the full article at NBA Hall of Famer Reggie Miller is Breaking the Cycling Mold on Velo.
author: Julia Dowd
